description.english: Head out to plunder distant planets.

Reveal 100 rooms with the Scout's perk.
Reveal four rooms with a single room clear.
Defeat 100 enemies with the berserker while at 1 health.

Deal damage to an enemy with a bomb.

displayName.english: Cool Guys Don't Look At Explosions

description.english: Deal the finishing blow to a boss with a bomb.
